## 基础用法 @en{Basic Usage}

#### 1

```vue
<template>
    <div class="loading-demo-basic">
        <arco-loading type="arc" />
        <arco-loading type="circle" />
        <arco-loading type="spin" />
        <arco-loading type="dot" />
    </div>
</template>
```

```less
.loading-demo-basic {
    .@{prefix}-loading {
        .rem(margin-right, 20);
        vertical-align: middle;
    }
}
```
